criteria: Understanding of Risks Associated with Sexual Activities
Understanding of Consequences Associated with Sexual Activities
Ability to Evaluate Risks and Consequences
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the risks associated with sexual activities, including HIV, other STDs, and pregnancy.
Demonstrates a minimal understanding of the risks associated with sexual activities. Shows significant gaps in knowledge.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of some risks associated with sexual activities but lacks depth and detail.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of most risks associated with sexual activities, including HIV, other STDs, and pregnancy.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the risks associated with sexual activities. Explains the risks clearly and accurately.
Demonstrates an exceptional understanding of the risks associated with sexual activities and can analyze the potential consequences in detail.
Demonstrates no understanding of the consequences associated with sexual activities, including HIV, other STDs, and pregnancy.
Demonstrates a minimal understanding of the consequences associated with sexual activities. Shows significant gaps in knowledge.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of some consequences associated with sexual activities but lacks depth and detail.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of most consequences associated with sexual activities, including HIV, other STDs, and pregnancy.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the consequences associated with sexual activities. Explains the consequences clearly and accurately.
Demonstrates an exceptional understanding of the consequences associated with sexual activities and can analyze the potential consequences in detail.
Unable to evaluate the risks and consequences associated with sexual activities.
Shows limited ability to evaluate the risks and consequences associated with sexual activities.
Demonstrates some ability to evaluate the risks and consequences but struggles with complex scenarios.
Demonstrates a satisfactory ability to evaluate the risks and consequences associated with sexual activities.
Demonstrates a strong ability to evaluate the risks and consequences associated with sexual activities and can apply this knowledge to different situations.
Demonstrates an exceptional ability to evaluate the risks and consequences associated with sexual activities. Can provide nuanced and insightful analysis.
